main event: A female observer in Miami, Florida reported seeing a round, bright object with a tail moving erratically in the sky on August 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object was first observed at 11:30 PM EDT while the witness was watching television.
The object moved from west to east at a high rate of speed, then stopped momentarily, and continued moving erratically in random directions.
The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 3 minutes.
No sound was associated with the object.
The witness was the only one who observed the object and did not take any photographs.
sighted object: round, bright object with a tail
